original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, blending deep analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to effectively communicate complex technical solutions to non-technical stakeholders. As a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently, you will collaborate cross-functionally to understand requirements, translate them into technical configurations, and continuously optimize processes through data-driven insights and best practices. With a focus on vehicle configuration, this position will leverage machine learning and artificial intelligence to rapidly develop innovative solutions that drive business success.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed business requirements and document them using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate complex business needs into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and improvement opportunities, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with the ability to write efficient queries and code

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, and the ability to apply them to optimize business processes
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration best practices and industry trends

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and troubleshooting machine learning and AI-powered solutions
- Track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software
- Familiarity with configuration management and version control tools, such as Git

This role is a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, where you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of our organization and operate at peak efficiency. As a key player in the vehicle configuration space, you will leverage your analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and effective communication to bridge the gap between business requirements and technical implementation.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover actionable insights
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of the system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively to develop innovative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with the ability to write efficient queries and code to support data-driven decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning and artificial intelligence, and the ability to apply these technologies to optimize business processes within the vehicle configuration space
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their implementation in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- In-depth knowledge of vehicle configuration best practices and industry trends

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing and troubleshooting machine learning and AI-powered solutions to address complex business challenges
- Demonstrated experience in translating business requirements into effective technical configurations and configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, and the ability to leverage this knowledge to drive continuous improvement

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using a variety of database querying and reporting tools, such as SQL and data visualization software
- Experience with configuration management and version control tools, such as Git, to ensure the integrity and traceability of system configurations

This role is a unique opportunity to blend your business acumen and technical expertise to drive the optimization of our vehicle configuration systems. As a key player in this mission-critical function, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of the organization and operate at the highest levels of efficiency. By leveraging your analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and effective communication, you will bridge the gap between business requirements and technical implementation, delivering innovative solutions that directly impact our bottom line.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows
- Translate these complex business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing advanced database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover actionable insights that drive business optimization
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive continuous improvement
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating
